Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Southbound Reroute near South Chicago/Greenwood
ShortDescription: Southbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 75th, Greenwood and 75th: due to, street blockage near South Chicago/Greenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 75th, Greenwood, 75th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near South Chicago/Greenwood.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ashland/90th
ShortDescription: NB 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 95th, Vincennes, 87th & Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/90th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 95th, Vincennes, 87th, then resume their normal route on Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/90th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #49 Western Temporary Southbound Reroute near Western/Waveland
ShortDescription: Southbound 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Irving Park, Damen, Addison and Western, due to street blockage near Western/Waveland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Irving Park, Damen, Addison, then resume their normal route on Western, due to street blockage near Western/Waveland.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays from the area of 95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays from the area of 95th.

We are moving and crews are working to restore normal service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
